sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Card, Col, Dropdown, Row, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import FeatherIcons from 'feather-icons-react'; interface TaskDetailsProps { newTask: (status: string, queue: string) => void; } const TaskDetails = ({ newTask }: TaskDetailsProps) => { return ( Shreyu Design Shreyu Design Development Shreyu Angular Shreyu React ); }; export default TaskDetails;
